description: This table supplements the PAT_ENC and PAT_ENC_2 tables. It contains additional information related to patient encounters or appointments.

columns.name: PAT_ENC_CSN
columns.description: The unique contact serial number for this contact. This number is unique across all patient encounters in your system. If you use IntraConnect, this is the Unique Contact Identifier (UCI).

columns.name: PAT_ENC_DATE_REAL
columns.description: A unique contact date in decimal format. The integer portion of the number indicates the date of contact. The digits after the decimal distinguish different contacts on the same date and are unique for each contact on that date. For example, .00 is the first/only contact, .01 is the second contact, etc.

columns.name: CHKOUT_USER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID number of the user who completed the check out process for the patient for this encounter. If the encounter has not been checked out, this field will appear as "null." This ID may be encrypted.

columns.name: ENC_BILL_AREA_ID
columns.description: The bill area which should be assigned to charges created from this encounter. The available bill areas to choose from will be determined based on lists in the provider and department records.

columns.name: ENC_BILL_AREA_ID_BILL_AREA_NAME
columns.description: The record name of this bill area, financial subdivision, or financial division.

columns.name: RX_CHG_ADMIT_FLG_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item contains the status of charge suppression for the patient. 1 indicates all charges are being suppressed. 2 indicates suppressed charges are now dropped. 3 indicates some or all charges are currently being suppressed.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


All Rx Charges Pending


Rx Dropped Charges on Admission


Rx Charges Pending -- Charges Individually Flagged


Rx Dropped Charges by Utility

columns.name: DX_UNIQUE_COUNTER
columns.description: The number of unique diagnoses associated with this patient encounter. Unique diagnoses are stored in item EPT 18425, which is extracted by the DX_UNIQUE column in the PAT_ENC_DX table.

columns.name: HP_DEFAULTED_YN
columns.description:
Whether the hospital problem was automatically populated from the list of admission diagnoses.  This column will have a Y if the problem was populated from an admission diagnosis and an N otherwise.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Yes


No

columns.name: IP_CP_LAST_VAR_DTTM
columns.description: The date and time the last care plan variance was documented.

columns.name: READY_QUT_SMOKING_C_NAME
columns.description:
This column is used to indicate whether patient is ready to quit smoking.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Not Asked


Yes


No

columns.name: COUNSELING_GIVEN_C_NAME
columns.description:
This column is used to indicate whether smoking counseling is given.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Not Answered


Yes


No

columns.name: COMMAUTO_SENDER_ID
columns.description: The unique user ID of the sender of the automatically generated communications.

columns.name: BENEFIT_ID
columns.description: The benefit record used to store discrete information about the patient's insurance benefits for this encounter.

columns.name: PREPAY_DUE_AMT
columns.description: The amount of pre-payment that is due for this visit.

columns.name: PREPAY_AMT_FROM_C_NAME
columns.description:
The activity that set the pre-payment due amount.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Estimate


Benefit Collection


Payment Collection


External System


Financial Assistance

columns.name: PREPAY_PAID_AMT
columns.description: The pre-payment amount that has been collected for this visit.

columns.name: PREADMSN_TESTING_DT
columns.description: The preadmission testing date.

columns.name: SMK_CESS_USER_ID
columns.description: The last user to modify the Smoking Cessation items for the encounter.

columns.name: SMK_CESS_DTTM
columns.description: Indicates whether Instant Smoking Cessation items were modified for an encounter.

columns.name: DO_NOT_BILL_INS_YN
columns.description:
Indicates if a visit is marked as Do Not Bill Insurance.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: SELF_PAY_VISIT_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether a visit is self-pay.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: DO_NOT_BILL_INS_YN

columns.name: REFERRAL_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The means by which the patient learned about the organization.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 No Entries Defined

columns.name: SCHOOL
columns.description: The patient's school.

columns.name: COPAY_NUM_UNITS
columns.description: The number of units used to calculate the copay for this encounter.

columns.name: COPAY_AMT_PER_UNIT
columns.description: The copay per each copay unit for this encounter.

columns.name: COPAY_LASTCALC_DT
columns.description: The date the copay was last calculated for this encounter.

columns.name: COPAY_OVERRIDDEN_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether the user has overridden the copay amount for this encounter.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: DO_NOT_BILL_INS_YN

columns.name: OB_TOTAL_WT_GAIN
columns.description: This column contains the patient's total weight gain in ounces as of the encounter if the patient had a weight documented on the encounter and a pregnancy episode with a pregravid weight linked to the encounter.

columns.name: MEDICAID_GROUP_NAME
columns.description: Item to store the name of a group defined by a Medicaid program.

columns.name: STUDENT_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
Tracks a patient's student status for a given encounter.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 No Entries Defined

columns.name: MEDICAID_GROUP_ID
columns.description: Item to store the identifier of a group defined by a Medicaid program.

columns.name: EXTERNAL_REF_ID
columns.description: The reference ID from an external organization for the patient visit.

columns.name: OUTCOME_C_NAME
columns.description:
The clinical outcome of an encounter.  The value of this item will then be used to determine the appropriate RTT/waiting status for the encounter. It is primarily applicable to the UK and Denmark.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: HSPC_NO_ADM_C_NAME
columns.description:
The Hospice Reason for Non-Admit category ID for the hospice episode.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes
